12 Loader::Loader(QString port, int reset_gpio, bool useRtsReset, QObject * parent) :
13  QObject(parent)
14 {
15  this->useRtsReset = useRtsReset;
16  version = 0;
17  resourceErrorCount = 0;
18 
19  serial.setSettingsRestoredOnClose(false);
20  serial.setPortName(port);
21 
22 #if not defined(Q_PROCESSOR_ARM_V6)
23  serial.setBaudRate(230400);
24 #endif
25 
26  connect(&serial, SIGNAL(error(QSerialPort::SerialPortError)),
27  this, SLOT(device_error(QSerialPort::SerialPortError)));
28 
29  connect(this, SIGNAL(sendError(int, const QString &)),
30  this, SLOT(print_error(int, const QString &)));
31 
32  this->reset_gpio = reset_gpio;
33 
34  int request_length = 250;
35  int reply_length = 250;
36 
37  sequence = build_lfsr_sequence(request_length + reply_length);
38  request = build_request(sequence, request_length);
39  reply = build_reply(sequence, reply_length, request_length);
40 
41 }

44 {
45  serial.close();

48 int Loader::get_version()
49 {
50  handshake();
51  write_long(Command::Shutdown);
52  QCoreApplication::processEvents();
53  return version;
54 }

56 int Loader::open()
57 {
58  resourceErrorCount = 0;
59 
60  if (!serial.open(QIODevice::ReadWrite))
61  {
62  qDebug() << serial.errorString();
63  return 1;
64  }
65 #if defined(Q_PROCESSOR_ARM_V6) && defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
66  serial.setBaudRate(115200);
67 #endif
68  return 0;
69 }

71 int Loader::close()
72 {
73  serial.close();
74  return 0;
75 }

77 void Loader::reset()
78 {
79  serial.clear(QSerialPort::Output);
80 
81  if (reset_gpio > -1)
82  {
83  GPIO gpio(reset_gpio, GPIO::Out);
84  gpio.Write(GPIO::Low);
85  gpio.Write(GPIO::High);
86  }
87  else
88  {
89  if (useRtsReset)
90  {
91  serial.setRequestToSend(true);
92  serial.setRequestToSend(false);
93  }
94  else
95  {
96  serial.setDataTerminalReady(true);
97  serial.setDataTerminalReady(false);
98  }
99  }
100 
101 
102 #if defined(Q_PROCESSOR_ARM_V6) && defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
103  QThread::msleep(80);
104 #else
105  QThread::msleep(60);
106 #endif
107 
108  serial.clear(QSerialPort::Input);
109 }

111 void Loader::calibrate()
112 {
113  write_byte(0xf9);
114 }

118  serial.putChar(value);

122 {

145 
146 void Loader::read_handshake()
147 {
148  if (serial.bytesAvailable() == 258)
149  {
150  real_reply = serial.read(reply.size());
151 
152  if (real_reply != reply)
153  {
154  emit finished();
155  }
156 
157  QByteArray versiondata = serial.read(8);
158 
159  version = 0;
160  for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++)
161  {
162  version = ((version >> 1) & 0x7f) | ((versiondata.at(i) & 0x1) << 7);
163  }
164 // qDebug() << QString::number(version);
165  emit finished();
166  }
167 }
168 
169 QByteArray Loader::encode_long(unsigned int value)
170 {
171  QByteArray result;
172  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
173  {
174  result.append(0x92 | (value & 0x01) | ((value & 2) << 2) | ((value & 4) << 4));
175  value >>= 3;
176  }
177  result.append(0xf2 | (value & 0x01) | ((value & 2) << 2));
178 // qDebug() << result.toHex().data();
179  return result;
180 }
181 
182 int Loader::lfsr(int * seed)
183 {
184  char ret = *seed & 0x01;
185  *seed = ((*seed << 1) & 0xfe) | (((*seed >> 7) ^ (*seed >> 5) ^ (*seed >> 4) ^ (*seed >> 1)) & 1);
186  return ret;
187 }
188 
189 QList<char> Loader::build_lfsr_sequence(int size)
190 {
191  int seed = 'P';
192 
193  QList<char> seq;
194  for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
195  {
196  seq.append(lfsr(&seed));
197  }
198 
199  return seq;
200 }
201 
202 QByteArray Loader::build_request(QList<char> seq, int size)
203 {
204  QByteArray array;
205  for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
206  {
207  array.append(seq[i] | 0xfe);
208  }
209  return array;
210 }
211 
212 
213 QByteArray Loader::build_reply(QList<char> seq, int size, int offset)
214 {
215  QByteArray array;
216  for (int i = offset;
217  i < (offset + size);
218  i++)
219  {
220  array.append(seq[i] | 0xfe);
221  }
222  return array;
223 }

225 void Loader::loader_error()
226 {
227  error = Error::Timeout;
228 }

230 void Loader::print_error(int code, const QString & message)
231 {
232  qDebug("[ ERROR %2i ]: %s",code,qPrintable(message));
233 }
234 
235 void Loader::device_error(QSerialPort::SerialPortError e)
236 {
237  switch (e)
238  {
239  case QSerialPort::NoError:
240  break;
241  case QSerialPort::DeviceNotFoundError:
242  case QSerialPort::PermissionError:
243  case QSerialPort::NotOpenError:
244  break;
245  case QSerialPort::ParityError:
246  case QSerialPort::FramingError:
247  case QSerialPort::BreakConditionError:
248  case QSerialPort::WriteError:
249  case QSerialPort::ReadError:
250  case QSerialPort::UnsupportedOperationError:
251  case QSerialPort::TimeoutError:
252  case QSerialPort::UnknownError:
253  case QSerialPort::ResourceError: // SUPER IMPORTANT
254  resourceErrorCount++;
255  if (resourceErrorCount > 1)
256  {
257  qDebug() << "ERROR: " << e;
258  close();
259  emit finished();
260  emit sendError(e,"Device unexpectedly disconnected!");
261  }
262  break;
263  default:
264  break;
265  }
266 
267  error = Error::Timeout;
268 }
269 
270 
271 int Loader::handshake()
272 {
273  reset();
274 
275  real_reply.clear();
276 
277  QByteArray header(reply.size()+8,'\xf9');
278 
279  connect(&serial, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(read_handshake()));
280 
281  calibrate();
282  serial.write(request);
283  serial.write(header);
284 
285  QEventLoop loop;
286  QTimer timer;
287  timer.setSingleShot(true);
288  connect(this, SIGNAL(finished()), &loop, SLOT(quit()));
289  connect(&timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), &loop, SLOT(quit()));
290  connect(&timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(loader_error()));
291  timer.start(500);
292  loop.exec();
293 
294  disconnect(&serial, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(read_handshake()));
295 
296  return version;
297 }
298 
299 int Loader::checksum(QByteArray binary, bool isEEPROM)
300 {
301  int checksum = 0;
302  for (int i = 0; i < binary.size(); i++)
303  {
304  checksum += (unsigned char) binary.at(i);
305  }
306 
307  if (!isEEPROM)
308  {
309  checksum += 2 * (0xff + 0xff + 0xf9 + 0xff);
310  }
311  checksum &= 0xff;
312 
313  return checksum;
314 }
315 
316 QByteArray Loader::convert_binary_to_eeprom(QByteArray binary)
317 {
318  int EEPROM_SIZE = 32768;
319 
320  if (binary.size() > EEPROM_SIZE - 8)
321  {
322  qDebug() << "Code too long for EEPROM (max" << EEPROM_SIZE - 8 << "bytes)";
323  return QByteArray();
324  }
325 
326  int dbase = (unsigned char) binary.at(0x0a) +
327  ((unsigned char) binary.at(0x0b) << 8);
328 
329  if (dbase > EEPROM_SIZE)
330  {
331  qDebug() << "Binary size greater than EEPROM_SIZE";
332  return QByteArray();
333  }
334 
335 // qDebug() << "DBASE" << dbase
336 // << QString::number((unsigned char) binary.at(0x0a))
337 // << QString::number((unsigned char) binary.at(0x0b));
338 
339  binary.append(QByteArray(dbase - 8 - binary.size(),0x00));
340  binary.append(QByteArray::fromHex("fffff9fffffff9ff"));
341  binary.append(QByteArray(EEPROM_SIZE - binary.size(),0x00));
342 
343  return binary;
344 }
345 
346 
347 QByteArray Loader::encode_binary(QByteArray binary)
348 {
349  QByteArray encoded_binary;
350  for (int i = 0 ; i < binary.size() ; i += 4)
351  {
352  encoded_binary.append(encode_long(
353  ((unsigned char) binary.at(i)) |
354  ((unsigned char) binary.at(i + 1) << 8) |
355  ((unsigned char) binary.at(i + 2) << 16) |
356  ((unsigned char) binary.at(i + 3) << 24)
357  ));
358  }
359  return encoded_binary;
360 }

362 void Loader::write_terminal(const QString & text)
363 {
364  serial.write(qPrintable(text));
365  serial.write("\r");
366 }
367 
368 void Loader::read_terminal()
369 {
370  foreach (char c, serial.readAll())
371  {
372  switch (c)
373  {
374  case 10:
375  case 13:
376  fprintf(stdout,"\n");
377  break;
378  default:
379  fprintf(stdout,"%c",c);
380  }
381  }
382  fflush(stdout);
383 }
384 
385 void Loader::terminal()
386 {
387  serial.setBaudRate(115200);
388  connect(&serial, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(read_terminal()));
389  connect(&console, SIGNAL(textReceived(const QString &)),this, SLOT(write_terminal(const QString &)));
390 
391 
392 
393  QEventLoop loop;
394  connect(this, SIGNAL(finished()), &loop, SLOT(quit()));
395  loop.exec();
396 
397  disconnect(&console, SIGNAL(textReceived(const QString &)),this, SLOT(write_terminal(const QString &)));
398  disconnect(&serial, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(read_terminal()));
399 
400  return;
401 }
402 
403 void Loader::upload_binary(QByteArray binary, bool eeprom, bool run)
404 {
405  if (binary.isEmpty())
406  {
407  print_status("EMPTY IMAGE");
408  return;
409  }
410 
411  if (binary.size() % 4 != 0)
412  {
413  print_status("INVALID IMAGE SIZE");
414  return;
415  }
416 
417  if (eeprom)
418  {
419  binary = convert_binary_to_eeprom(binary);
420  }
421 
422  if (checksum(binary, eeprom))
423  {
424  print_status("BAD CHECKSUM");
425  return;
426  }
427 
428  QByteArray encoded_binary = encode_binary(binary);
429 
430  print_task("Connecting to '"+serial.portName()+"'...");
431  if (!handshake())
432  {
433  print_status("NOT FOUND");
434  return;
435  }
436  print_status("DONE");
437 
438  int command = 2*eeprom + run;
439  write_long(command);
440 
441  print_task("Downloading to RAM...");
442  if (send_application_image(encoded_binary, binary.size()) != 0)
443  return;
444 
445  print_status("DONE");
446 
447  print_task("Verifying RAM...");
448  if (poll_acknowledge() != 0)
449  {
450  print_status("BAD CHECKSUM");
451  return;
452  }
453 
454  print_status("DONE");
455 
456  if (!eeprom)
457  return;
458 
459  print_task("Writing EEPROM...");
460 
461  if (poll_acknowledge() != 0)
462  {
463  print_status("FAIL");
464  return;
465  }
466  print_status("DONE");
467 
468  print_task("Verifying EEPROM...");
469 
470  if (poll_acknowledge() != 0)
471  {
472  print_status("FAIL");
473  return;
474  }
475  print_status("DONE");
476 
477  if (run)
478  reset();
479 }
480 
481 void Loader::writeEmpty()
482 {
483  if (serial.bytesToWrite())
484  error = 0;
485  emit finished();
486 }
487 
488 void Loader::read_acknowledge()
489 {
490 // qDebug() << "GOT ACK" << serial.bytesAvailable();
491  if (serial.bytesAvailable())
492  {
493  ack = QString(serial.readAll().data()).toInt();
494 // qDebug() << "ACK" << ack;
495  poll.stop();
496  error = 0;
497  emit finished();
498  }
499 }
500 
501 int Loader::send_application_image(QByteArray encoded_binary, int image_size)
502 {
503  error = 0;
504  connect(&serial, SIGNAL(bytesWritten(qint64)), this, SLOT(writeEmpty()));
505 
506  write_long(image_size / 4);
507  serial.write(encoded_binary);
508 
509  QEventLoop loop;
510  connect(this, SIGNAL(finished()), &loop, SLOT(quit()));
511  loop.exec();
512 
513  disconnect(&serial, SIGNAL(bytesWritten(qint64)), this, SLOT(writeEmpty()));
514 
515  return error;
516 }
517 
518 int Loader::poll_acknowledge()
519 {
520  connect(&serial, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(read_acknowledge()));
521  connect(&poll, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(calibrate()));
522 
523  poll.setInterval(20);
524  poll.start();
525 
526  QEventLoop loop;
527  connect(this, SIGNAL(finished()), &loop, SLOT(quit()));
528 
529  QTimer timeout;
530  timeout.setSingleShot(true);
531  connect(&timeout, SIGNAL(timeout()), &loop, SLOT(quit()));
532  connect(&timeout, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(loader_error()));
533  timeout.start(5000);
534 
535  loop.exec();
536 
537  disconnect(&poll);
538  disconnect(&poll, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(calibrate()));
539 
540  disconnect(&serial, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(read_acknowledge()));
541 
542  return error;
543 }

546 QStringList Loader::list_devices()
547 {
548  QList<QSerialPortInfo> ports = QSerialPortInfo::availablePorts();
549  QStringList result;
550 
551  foreach (QSerialPortInfo port, ports)
552  {
553  result.append(port.systemLocation());
554  }
555  return result;
556 }
